name: Plip-plop! Unstable Conditions of Care
description:
NOTE: if you experience audio issues, please download the native Mac / Windows versions!

You have adopted some cute little plip-plops! Congratulations.

Caring for them can be a handful, but I know you're up to the task. All you have to do is feed, water, scoopidy doopidy, and make sure they're not too hot or cold. 

How hard could it be?

Submitted to Ludum Dare 49: Unstable:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/plip-plop-unstable-conditions-of-care

Game, art, and music by Sakura Magika.

A huge thank you to Nessie for all the support and flowers through the weekend!
